title: In Between. Part 2
creator_credit: Chris Warner, Mandy Smith and Kim Dalton
brief_description: Two episodes of “In Between” a series of dramas set in Melbourne that looks at the pressures of growing up. Episode Three looks at Angie who is bright, tough and enjoys life. However, life is suddenly more complicated when she discovers that she is pregnant. Episode Four is about Alex who is confused by the different pressures that his father and friends place upon him to grow up.
